title: Thirty Years' War as turning point

content.question: Directions: Suggested planning and writing time - 35 minutes.Write an essay that:Has a relevant thesis.Addresses all parts of the question.Supports thesis with specific evidence.Is well organized.Analyze various ways in which the Thirty Years’ War (1618-1648) represented a turning point in European history.

frqParts.text: Directions: Suggested planning and writing time - 35 minutes.Write an essay that:Has a relevant thesis.Addresses all parts of the question.Supports thesis with specific evidence.Is well organized.Analyze various ways in which the Thirty Years’ War (1618-1648) represented a turning point in European history.

skill.text: Skill 4.A: Identify and describe a historical context for a specific historical development or process.
